header.title: XPontus XML Editor features
header.meta: XML Editor, XML, XSLT, XML IDE, DTD, DTD Editor, XSLT Editor, XSLT Debugger, XSL Editor, XPontus XML Editor, Java based XML Editor

ul.li: Syntax highlighting with true lexer support(using JFlex) for XML related files, HTML, Java, C/C++, Javascript, properties files
Use templates to create XML files
Multiple XSLT processors(Saxon 6.5.5, Xalan 2.7.0 and Saxon-B 8.5.1)
Schema validation with relax-ng or trex or XML Schema
XMLDiff support - You can only inspect differences between 2 XML files for now
XSLT transformations with user defined scenarios
HTML, XML , text, PDF, SVG and Postscript output support for XSLT transformations
User interface and program settings customization
Multilingal interface(english and french for now) - !french translation is almost complete!
Platform interoperability as the software is written in Java
